name: Fiery Menace!
tooltip:
Fiery Menace!

Hansel Heavyhands wants you to kill 20 Greater Lava Spiders in the Searing Gorge. You can find Greater Lava Spiders in the plateaus and lava pools of the Searing Gorge.

Return to Hansel Heavyhands in the Searing Gorge when you have killed enough Greater Lava Spiders.

Requirements:
- Greater Lava Spider x 20
